name: Sketchbox
detailed_description:
Sketchbox is the #1 design tool for AR/VR.

We created it specifically for designing applications/experiences and UI/UX ideas.

Go from idea to an ‘in-VR’ design in minutes. Import your files, build your scenes, and create a VR storyboard that everyone can understand. Finally you can design for AR & VR without using a game engine or engaging a developer.

Get clients and stakeholders comfortable with your plan. They’ll get a sense for what the finished experience will feel like. Stop waving your hands and using paper sketches to explain yourself. We intentionally chose a ‘sketch-like’ aesthetic so you spend less time on details, and more time on what matters.

With Sketchbox you can:
> CREATE VR STORYBOARDS to explain user flows.
> IMPORT ASSETS from Google Poly, or use your own images, 3D models and 360° images.
>> GROUP OBJECTS to create components that can be moved and duplicated. Perfect for UI components, like menus.
> EXPORT TO FBX. Easily share finished sketches on any device.

Read more at https://www.sketchbox3d.com/?ref=steam

Note: When you first launch Sketchbox, you're asked to create an account. Accounts let us support sharing features. We don't send spam.

short_description: Sketchbox is the #1 design tool for AR & VR. Sketch ideas in VR then present them as a VR storyboard, or interact with them. Get a sense of scale, ergonomics and flow, without fighting a game engine.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
